GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v6.0
GSD.description:
bnxt: prevent skb UAF after handing over to PTP worker

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0 by commit c31f26c8f69f776759cbbdfb38e40ea91aa0dd65, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 83bb623c968e7351aee5111547693f95f330dc5a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: bnxt: prevent skb UAF after handing over to PTP worker
